org.sd.text
Class FreqOnomasticon

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.text.FreqOnomasticon

public class FreqOnomasticon
extends java.lang.Object

An onomasticon (names database) with frequencies attached to the names.

This implementation will store the names in a backing berkeley db database through a DbMap.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Nested Class Summary
static class FreqOnomasticon.FreqName
          Data structure to hold a name with its frequency info.

Constructor Detail

FreqOnomasticon

public FreqOnomasticon(java.io.File namesTextFile)
Construct with the location of the names text file.

The file is assumed to have lines of the form: "name|freq" and the order of the lines in the file are assumed to correspond to 'rank', starting from 1. Empty lines and those beginning with '#' are ignored.

Method Detail

lookup

public FreqOnomasticon.FreqName lookup(java.lang.String name)
Lookup the given (unnormalized) name.

Returns:
the FreqName instance for the name or null if the name is not in this onomasticon.
